    • renderToStyleText

Provides TTF text rendering. Use SDL2_ttf.

Imports

../thirdparty/sdl2, ../thirdparty/sdl2/ttf, ../thirdparty/opengl, image, vector2, anchor, color, nodes_os, exceptions

Types

StyleUnicode = ref object
  is_url*: bool
  style*: cint
  c*, url*: string
  color*: ColorRef

StyleText = ref object
  font*: FontPtr
  rendered*: bool
  spacing*: float
  max_lines*: int
  texture*: GlTextureObj
  chars*: seq[StyleUnicode]
